channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Leni Riefenstahl made movies for Hitler. A new documentary digs through her archives
item.description: Adolf Hitler commissioned filmmaker Leni Riefenstahl to make propaganda about Nazi Germany. She lived to be 101 years old and denied knowing about the...

item.title: Memorable Moments of the 2025 MTV Video Music Awards: Mariah Carey, Lady Gaga and More
item.description: Mariah Carey and Busta Rhymes were honored for the first time, Lady Gaga crossed town and Doja Cat took it back to the 1980s.

item.title: This is what could happen to a child who doesn't get vaccinated
item.description: An estimated 14 million kids don't get any vaccines. They face serious threats from measles, diarrhea, pneumonia and more.

item.title: Appeals Court Upholds Carroll’s $83 Million Judgment Against Trump
item.description: The judges rejected President Trump’s argument that the Supreme Court’s decision extending presidential immunity should shield him from liability for ...

item.title: Juggling Congress and Life, She Opted to Freeze Her Eggs
item.description: Representative Sara Jacobs, Democrat of California, said her experience planning for a future pregnancy inspired her to write a bill to expand coverag...

item.title: At Least 12 Are Killed in Nepal in Protests Over Social Media Ban
item.description: Demonstrators stormed the Parliament complex days after the government banned most social media platforms. At least 200 people were injured, local new...

item.title: States Heading Toward Constitutional Showdown Over Abortion Shield Laws
item.description: Texas and New York are at the leading edge of an escalating states’ rights battle over the mailing of abortion pills to patients in states with bans.

item.title: After 6 years, Hollow Knight Silksong is here at last — and it was worth the wait
item.description: Hollow Knight was a Kickstarter-backed project that obliterated expectations. Now, after years of rumors, memes and anticipation, the three-person ind...

item.title: Attempted Trump assassination trial begins. And, South Korea to fly 300 workers home
item.description: Jury selection begins today in the trial of the man charged with attempting to assassinate Trump last year. And, South Korea plans to bring home more ...

item.title: Shooting attack at Jerusalem bus stop kills at least 5

item.title: A New, ‘Adorable’ Deep-Sea Fish Swims Into View
item.description: The bumpy snailfish, discovered 10,000 feet down off the coast of California, shows that not all denizens of the abyss are frightening.

item.title: London’s Commuters Wrestle With a Massive Tube Strike: ‘It’s Just Annoying’
item.description: Some people were able to work from home. Others crammed onto buses or spent hours trying to reach their destinations.

item.title: Nepalese Protesters Briefly Storm Parliament Over Social Media Ban

item.title: New Banksy Work Seen as Comment on Crackdown on Palestine Action Supporters
item.description: The mural that appeared outside the Royal Courts of Justice in London on Monday depicted a judge attacking a demonstrator with a gavel.
